name: BattleshipFX
description: A JavaFX application that allows you to play the famous Battleship game against an intelligent AI.
features: This project includes some advenced features such as a database that stores the scores of the players.
The AI is based on a algorithm that allows it to play intelligently to increase the difficulty of the game.
The application is available on every platform thanks to JavaFX.
The application is easy to use, you just have to click on the cells to place your ships and to attack the enemy's ships.

name: Instant-Weather
description: A JavaScript application that displays the current weather for a given location.

name: Portfolio
description: After acquiring a wide range of skills, I decided to create my own portfolio to showcase my projects and my skills and to help with my intern research.

name: Petit-Cuistot
description: A PHP application that allows users to share recipes and comment on them.
